sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_dict ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), domainid char(32), name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, dictmark int2 not null, description varchar(256), items int4 not null, oorder int4 not null, primary key(id), unique(name), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_dict_item ( id char(32) not null, dictid char(32) not null, parentid char(32), domainid char(32), text varchar(128) not null, codeno varchar(128), itemmark int2 not null, createDate timestamp, userid char(32), description varchar(256), ext1 varchar(64), ext2 int4 not null, ext3 varchar(64), ext4 int8 not null, oorder int4 not null, primary key(id), unique(dictid, codeno), unique(oorder) );
